data.title: Without Sarah nothing goes! a wacky romantic comedy about Max
data.meta_description: Without Sarah Nothing Goes, directed by Nicholas Stoller and written by Jason Segel, is available to stream on Max from August 2, 2024. Released on June 18, 2008, this romantic comedy tells the hilarious and touching story of a man trying to get over a painful breakup.
data.text:
Without Sarah nothing goes!(Forgetting Sarah Marshall ) is a romantic comedy-drama directed by Nicholas Stoller. Originally released in cinemas on June 18, 2008, the film is now available on Max from August 2, 2024. With a screenplay by Jason Segel, who also plays the lead role, this comedy explores the misadventures of a man devastated by a romantic breakup and his desperate attempts to move on.

The film stars Jason Segel, Kristen Bell, Russell Brand, and Mila Kunis, who each bring their charm and humor to this colorful story. Without Sarah Nothing Goes! is distinguished by its mix of comedic moments, romance and heartfelt emotion, capturing the ups and downs of life after a separation.

Peter Bretter (played by Jason Segel) is a talented but little-known TV music composer. His life is turned upside down when his girlfriend, Sarah Marshall(Kristen Bell), a famous TV actress, abruptly leaves him. Devastated by the breakup, Peter sinks into depression, unable to get over the loss of the love of his life.

Looking for a way to forget Sarah and regain control of his life, Peter decides to go on vacation to Hawaii, hoping that the sunshine and heavenly beaches will help him move on. But on arrival, Peter is horrified to discover that Sarah is staying in the same hotel, accompanied by her new partner, Aldous Snow(Russell Brand), an eccentric and provocative British rock singer.

Despite awkward encounters and painful memories, Peter tries to put a smile on his face by befriending hotel employee Rachel(Mila Kunis). Rachel's comforting and charming presence pushes Peter to open up and consider the possibility of a new beginning.

Without Sarah Nothing Goes! offers a heartfelt, comedic look at the difficulty of overcoming a romantic breakup. Through Peter's journey, the film explores universal themes such as emotional healing, self-acceptance and resilience. The characters, with their weaknesses and strengths, are portrayed with an authenticity that allows viewers to identify with them and become attached to them.

To be read

What to do in Paris and the Ile-de-France region in August 2024? Tips and ideas for outings

Summer films 2024: Top films to see at the cinema for a refreshing session

The dynamic between Peter and the other characters, notably the antagonism with Aldous Snow and the budding complicity with Rachel, illustrates the complexities of human relationships and how they evolve in unexpected circumstances. The film succeeds in balancing humor and emotion, offering moments of lightness while delicately tackling sensitive subjects.

The comedy also draws on the quirky humor of Jason Segel, who injects his character with a charming dose of vulnerability and awkwardness. Funny situations and incisive dialogue add a fresh touch to this romantic comedy that defies genre conventions.

Without Sarah Nothing Goes! is a refreshingly moving romantic comedy that combines humor, love and personal growth. Available on Max from August 2, 2024, this Nicholas Stoller-directed film is a delightful exploration of the challenges and surprises of life after a breakup. With memorable performances from Jason Segel, Kristen Bell, Russell Brand, and Mila Kunis, this comedy offers an entertaining and touching experience for anyone who has ever experienced the pangs of heartbreak.
